name: Deprecated
description: True if this query is deprecated.

name: Final
description: Specifies that subclasses cannot override the definition of the query.

name: Internal
description: If true, then do not display this item in automatic documentation.

name: SoapBindingStyle
description: Specifies what type of SOAP invocation is used for a web method. This keyword is ignored for non-web methods.

name: SoapBodyUse
description: Specifies what kind of SOAP encoding is used for the inputs and outputs of a web method. This keyword is ignored for non-web methods.

name: SqlName
description: If this query is projected as an SQL stored procedure, then this name is used as the name of the stored procedure.

name: SqlProc
description: Specifies that the query can be invoked as an SQL stored procedure.

name: SqlView
description: Specifies whether to project this query as an SQL View.

name: SqlViewName
description: Specifies an SQL alias for the view projected from this query.

name: WebMethod
description: description=Specifies that this query can be invoked using the SOAP protocol.
